short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Client Side Enhancements for Turkish Virtual Website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turkish Virtual + allows you to:
- Resize Turkish Virtual website, as wide as 4K.
- Use smaller spacers to go with your wider main page.
- Have more compact quick links section.

With further options on the way.
